titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller Foundation records, projects, SG 1.34 (A2008) FA493

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-01-01 05:02:07 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.langmaterial: Multiple languages contained in written material specific to country/region. Predominately written in English.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Project files transferred to the RAC by Rockefeller Foundation, 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Rockefeller Foundation has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them. Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Special Formats (digital media) have been separated from the body of the collection. All pertinent items are assigned a unique separation number, as noted. Requests to access open special formats should reference the unique separation number.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Records are primarily arranged by Program, with some materials arranged by the RF traditional series numbers.
Records are arranged as received. Within folders, materials are primarily arranged in reverse chronological order.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Grant administration files and related material.
